name: Race Manager
description:
RACE MANAGERTake on the role of manager of a single-seater team. Experience race weekends and manage your site and staff.



This game offers:


  • 27 circuits in the different capitals (and Africa is not forgotten)
  • 10 AI teams generated procedurally at the start of the season.
  • Scalable AI. The AI will make its own choices and its own investments.
  • Scalable weather, depending on the region of the globe.
  • Procedurally generated drivers/engineers/mechanic/motors/battery pack.
  • Multiple customization possibilities
  • Management of the research, marketing and employee team
